## StepApi interface

The API available to step functions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StepApi<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [emit(value, socket)](./workflow.stepapi.emit.md) | Emits data to an output socket. If undefined, default output. |
|  [input(socket)](./workflow.stepapi.input.md) | Gets data from an input socket. If undefined, default input |
